answers.answer: I'll be 37 weeks tomorrow and have a doctors appointment the next day- she will check then :)
I'll be 37 weeks tomorrow and my Dr. Is going to check me on Thursday.
I got checked when I was about 36.5wk
I'm 37 weeks 5 days my doc isn't going to till I'm 39 weeks

You ladies that were checked at 36 weeks were there any changes? I understand that every woman and pregnancy is different but with being a ftm I want to have an idea of what to expect. Can any of you explain what the process was like?

I'm 37 weeks 3 days had a dr appt today and she still hasn't checked me. Idk if she ever will or not. Yeah I'm kind of curious but I feel like it'd just make me more anxious than I already am because you can be dilated and all that for weeks and still nothing!

I agree with you firsttimemommie15. I'm just too curious I guess. I wonder if I'm dilated because I see that my baby is dropping/has dropped since I have a small torso. And lately I've been getting strong menstrual cramps that last no more than 2-3 minutes but they are still irregular.

My doctor doesnt check until 39 40 weeks. She believes that checking stirs things up and doesnt like to do it until baby is good to come out!  With my first i was never checked as i had my lil girl at 37 weeks.  All doctors are different.
I started getting checked at 36 weeks. I'm now 37 weeks and 2 cm dilated.
Mine didn't start checking me till I was 39 weeks. But I'm pretty sure it differs doctor to doctor.
I was checked today @ 38+1 I am 1 cm dilated and 50% effaced

I had my check up Thursday and my doctor said he would check me at 38 weeks if I make it that long. Lol. Have you/someone you know ever been induced? My doctor told me that I will be induced at 39 weeks since I take insulin for gestational diabetes.

question: Hey ladies I'm almost 37 weeks pregnant. I was wondering when did your doctor's start checking to see how dilated you were? Ftm and very curious.
title: Curious Question
